page.title: 16Adams School Day In Hoo.
page.content: {Wednesday 17 July 1985. I woke up at 7.21 had breakfast, a wash and got dressed.8.10.Started to walk to school. 8.45 start of registration.9.15. English punctuation.10.00.Start of creative English. In English we made pop_up books.10.45 Breaktime.11.00 In games we played cricket.11.45 In Science we watched videos on oxygen and teeth. 12.30 Lunchtime sat and talked and then had lunch which was an apple and a meat roll.1.40 Went fo registration 2.00 went to play house cricket and my team won.3.30 started to walk home. 4.30 Went to friends house and then home.6.30 Went to Boys Club to play football and manhunt.9.30 got home and had a wash.9.45 Went to bed. {By {Adam Knight (13yrs)
